original_text: Moses' parents believed God. When Moses was born, they hid him for three months. They saw that he was a very special child. As a result of their faith, they did not obey Egypt's king. They were not afraid to do that.
korean_text: 믿음으로 모세가 났을 때에 그 부모가 아름다운 아이임을 보고 석 달 동안 숨겨 왕의 명령을 무서워하지 아니하였으며

sentences.original_text: they hid him for three months.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 석 달 동안 그를 숨겼습니다.

sentences.original_text: he was a very special child.
As a result of their faith,
they did not obey Egypt's king.
They were not afraid to do that.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그렇게 하는 것을 두려워하지 않았습니다.
